hero.title: Smooth Skin with Laser Hair Removal

about.title: What is Laser Hair Removal?
about.text: Laser hair removal is a safe and effective way to remove unwanted hair using advanced laser technology.

items.experts_text: Our team is trained and certified.
items.equipment_text: Latest laser technology for best results.

form.name: Name
form.error: Error submitting form. Please try again.
form.error_name: Please enter a valid name (at least 2 letters).
form.error_phone: Please enter a valid phone number (9-15 digits).

questions.pain_text: No, our cooling technology ensures a comfortable experience.
questions.durability: How long do the results last?
questions.durability_text: After completing a full course, the results are long-lasting. Periodic maintenance sessions may be needed.
questions.preparation: How should I prepare for the procedure?
questions.preparation_text: Before the session, you should shave the treatment area and avoid sun exposure for at least two weeks.
questions.suitability: Is laser hair removal suitable for all skin types?
questions.suitability_text: Modern laser technology is effective for various skin types and hair colors, but it is best to consult with our specialist to determine the best approach for you.

meta.title: Privacy Policy - Laser By Nadiia
meta.description: Learn how Laser By Nadiia protects your personal data and ensures privacy.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: At Laser By Nadiia, we value your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data.

collection.title: Data Collection
collection.text: We collect personal information such as your name, phone number, and email when you fill out our booking form or contact us.

use.title: Data Use
use.text: Your data is used to process bookings, respond to inquiries, and improve our services. We do not share your information with third parties without your consent.

protection.title: Data Protection
protection.text: We implement security measures to protect your data from unauthorized access or disclosure.

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.text: You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal data. Contact us at info@your-site.com to exercise these rights.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.text: For questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at info@your-site.com or call +[Phone Number].
